article_title: Repeal and Replace Remains the Goal

article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes

og.description: The Congressional Budget Office (CBO) recently admitted that it has no idea what Obamacare will end up costing taxpayers. The budget agency has quietly gone back on its initial claim that the law would lower the deficit by $120 billion over the next decade. The reason? It can't track the hidden [...]
